name: intelli-salary
description: 一款工资条邮件群发智能小工具

scripts.buildwin: electron-packager ./ "Intelli Salary" --out=dist --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --overwrite --ignore=test --win32metadata.FileDescription="Intelli Salary" --win32metadata.ProductName="Intelli Salary" --appCopyright="Copyright(C) 2019 Sahara, Inc" --asar.unpackDir=xlsx  --icon=images/app_icon.ico
scripts.build: npm run buildmac && npm run buildwin
